comments:
Build 20020508

Attempting to add an internal jar to the classpath of a launch config results 
in the following exception:
!MESSAGE Error logged from Debug UI: 
!STACK org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException[5013]: 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Assert$AssertionFailedException: Assertion 
failed; Path for IClasspathEntry must be absolute..
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:82)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaCore.newLibraryEntry(JavaCore.java:1290)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.core.JavaCore.newLibraryEntry(JavaCore.java:1253)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.RuntimeClasspathEntry.<init>
(RuntimeClasspathEntry.java:195)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JavaRuntime.newRuntimeClasspathEntry
(JavaRuntime.java:450)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JavaRuntime.recoverRuntimePath
(JavaRuntime.java:632)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.launching.JavaRuntime.computeRuntimeClasspath
(JavaRuntime.java:612)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.launching.AbstractJavaLaunchConfigurationDelegate.getClasspath
(AbstractJavaLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:244)
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.launching.JavaLocalApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelega
te.launch(JavaLocalApplicationLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:60)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch
(LaunchConfiguration.java:141)
	at 
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.launchConfigurations.LaunchConfigurationDialog$8.r
un(LaunchConfigurationDialog.java:1996)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)

Fixed. The XML parser was returning empty strings when the code was 
expecting "null". This broke recovery of internal jars (which were recovered as 
external).

traces.message: Assertion  failed; Path for IClasspathEntry must be absolute..
